summary:
Adds linked strong boxes to inns, guilds, and other prominent locations in Skyrim. Add 
inventory items to any strong box and recover them from any of the others.
descriptionHtml:
CM Strong Boxes
===================

Adds linked strong boxes to inns, guilds, and other prominent locations 
in Skyrim. Add inventory items to any strong box and recover them from any 
of the others. 

New strong boxes can easily be placed in the world using the Creation Kit (CK).
Just load the mod into the CK, locate a position in the game world in the 
Render window, drag and drop the CMPlayerStrongBox from the Container list
in the Object window, and press F to drop it to the ground.  Then you can 
move the strong box were you want it, right click on the box, and select edit.
Click the Owner tab, and select Player to be the owner of the box.  Close all open 
windows, and save.  The new strong box will be automatically linked to the others.  


Recommended Mods
=======================

Any mod from Cutthroat Mods.


Installation Requirements for Version 1.0
=========================================

Official Skyrim patch 1.5 or greater.  
Download and install using one of the following methods.  


Installation - Nexus Mod Manager
================================

Use the \"Download with Manager\" button on the CM Strong Box Mod page 
at Skyrim Nexus and activate after download. 


Installation - Wrye Bash BAIN
=============================

Drop the CMStrongBox.esp and scripts folder into your Skyrim Mods\\Bash 
Installers folder, and then activate.


Installation - Manual
=====================

Drop the CMStrongBox.esp and scripts folder into your Data folder.


Uninstall
=========

If you used a mod management program, use it to uninstall. Otherwise 
delete CMStrongBox.esp from the Data folder and CMPlayerStrongBoxScript.pex
from the scripts folder.  


Load Order
==========

Load order will not make any difference.


Incompatible Mods
=================

The CM Strong Box mod should not cause conflicts unless another mod places
items in the game world where strong boxes are located.     


Known Issues
============

None.


Sources
=======

The original script fragment that is attached to the master strongbox was 
based on Andrew Clements\' scripting in his Master Chest mod.  Mr. Clements 
stated in his readme file that the script was already included in the game
and gave permission for reuse. 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12824

Bethesda Forum discussions: http://forums.bethsoft.com/forum/184-the-creation-kit/

The Creation Kit Wiki Tutorials - http://www.creationkit.com/Category:Tutorials

The Creation Kit - Steam download listed under Tools.


Licensing and Legal
===================

The CM Strong Box mod was created by Cutthroat Mods and is furnished as is
without promises or guarantees to be bug free or conflict free.  Any bugs 
inherent in the game engine or Creation Kit are not the responsibility of 
Cutthroat Mods.  

Do not upload this mod to any website without permission from Cutthroat Mods.
Uploads to Steam Workshop are not permitted and will never be approved.  
Translations into other languages are permitted  provided this Readme is 
included as is in English along with any translated versions.  Translated 
files can be uploaded to any website except Steam Workshop.  Permissions to 
do translations are not required.  If you have any questions or concerns 
please send email to cutthroatmods@hotmail.com. 


Revision History
================

Version 1.0 - Initial release.
